name: Beam
description: Creates a Beam from a referenced Line or LineCurve.

inputParameters.name: curve_ids
inputParameters.description: Referenced curve or line, Guid of curve or line in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: width
inputParameters.description: Width of the cross-section (usually the smaller dimension).

inputParameters.name: height
inputParameters.description: Height of the cross-section (usually the larger dimension).

inputParameters.name: z_vector
inputParameters.description: (optional) Vector defining the orientation of the cross-section (corresponds to the height dimension). If None, a default will be taken.

inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: (optional) Name of a group or subassembly.

inputParameters.name: update_attrs
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.
